localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

This is an application that displays the rear camera image like the kaleidoscope.
The image of the surprise can be seen in an easy operation.
Please do a new experience by this application.

Package size: 25 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller
- Camera

Supported languages:
English(United States)
